I question how many members of BLM actually know or fully understand the 10 """"Guiding Principles"""" of Black Lives Matter? That movement has nothing to do elevating the lives of blacks in the US, most especially in the crime ridden inner cities of our largest population centers. Much of what is outlined in the Guiding Principles of Black Lives Matter is reworded platform planks directly from the Communist Manifesto. From the BLM webpage.....BLACK VILLAGES. """"We are committed to disrupting the Western-prescribed nuclear family structure requirement by supporting each other as extended families and """"villages"""" that collectively care for one another, and especially """"our"""" children to the degree that mothers, parents and children are comfortable. Destroy the family construct so the village can raise THEIR children. No more fathers and mothers raising their children under a roof they call home. The villagers can't take any chance that those children might be taught anything beside that which the """"Village Chiefs"""" prescribe. First plank of the Communist manifesto......take control of the youth by separating them from their parents. Control all they learn and hear. Never allow they to know or hear an opposing point of view. That is Fascism 101. BLM is a prefabricated Socialist/Facist agenda. It was designed and developed by European Globalists with a goal of destroying the US.. They chose the disenfranchised black community as a foundation to set this agenda to work on because they would grasp onto anything they thought might give them hope. Thus the Black Lives Matter moniker. Just as the Democrats have been doing for 52 years, BLM is brainwashing these poor souls into believing this will be what will change their lives forever. It won't. The poor blacks of this country are being pimped again.

Putin has one interest and one interest only. That is his country. Unlike the US, his goals are not global in nature. How is his support for separatists in Eastern Ukraine any different than our support for Syrian Rebels? Actually there is a difference. We're trying a complete regime change in Syria as opposed to those in the Eastern Ukraine just wanting to remain with Russia. They aren't trying to take the whole country. Face it. We have a bad foreign policy. We are creating new enemies with the regime changes, interference in other countries, and engaging in decades long warfare which serves no purpose other than to make people rich. Our actions have nothing to do with freedom and democracy. Our government is hypocritical and the world sees it.
